name: Reach For The Sky (EndlessMc)
description:
Can you Reach the sky?

Reach For The Sky Is a puzzel game where players will stack multiple trash-objects to form a tower. 

But be careful Trash-objects of the same colours cannot touch!

Trash-objects will fall on the side platforms, build quick enough and keep them clean, otherwise trash will build up and fall off and you will need to start over. 

So you will need to keep at attention all time! 

Have fun building!
